official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the administrative and judicial review of claims (involving the amount of benefits payable) which arises under the supplementary medical insurance program.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for the administrative and judicial review of claims which arise under the supplementary medical insurance program (part B of title XVIII). Sets the minimum requirement for the amount in controversy for a hearing at $50 and for judicial review at $500.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the administrative and judicial review of claims (involving the amount of benefits payable) which arises under the supplementary medical insurance program.
